title: Waste Factor
summary: Apply a waste percentage to a base quantity.
whenToUse: Use when ordering materials to allow for cuts, defects, and offcuts.
howToUse: Enter base quantity and waste percentage.
steps: Confirm the base quantity is in the right unit.
commonMistakes: Applying waste twice by stacking percentages.
Rounding too early for large orders.
siteTips: Keep a standard waste allowance in settings for speed.
Use higher waste on complex profiles.
verification: Check that total is base plus the waste amount.
